jacdac.CompassCmd.Calibrate: No args. Starts a calibration sequence for the compass.
jacdac.CompassReg.Enabled:
Read-write bool (uint8_t). Turn on or off the sensor. Turning on the sensor may start a calibration sequence.
* ```
const [enabled] = jdunpack<[number]>(buf, "u8")
```
jacdac.CompassReg.Heading:
Read-only 째 u16.16 (uint32_t). The heading with respect to the magnetic north.
* ```
const [heading] = jdunpack<[number]>(buf, "u16.16")
```
jacdac.CompassReg.HeadingError:
Read-only 째 u16.16 (uint32_t). Error on the heading reading
* ```
const [headingError] = jdunpack<[number]>(buf, "u16.16")
```
